full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 troduction This certificate is part of the contract between you and Blue Cross of Massachusetts. Inc. and Blue Shield of Massachusetts. Inc We have taken special care to write this certificate so that you may understand it more easily We urge you to read all of it carefully Your contract consists of this certificate, your application and any amendments and supplemental agreements that are added to change this certificate in some way. Please note that words that are in italies in this certificate have special meanings These meanings are given in the "Definitions" section on pages 4 through 6. Blue Cross and Blue Shield provide benefits under this contract which are in addition to the benefits you get under Blue Cross subscribers certificate BCC 80 NG or BCC 250 NG and Blue Shield subscribers certificate BSC 80 NG There are other limits on your Blue Cross and Blue Shield membership. If you are a new Blue Crossand Blue Shieldmember you will have to maintain 240 or more consecutive days of membership before you will become eligible for the benefits that are described in this contract. HOWEVER, UNDER CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES WE WILL PROVIDE SOME BENEFITS DURING THIS WAITING PERIOD. When we will do so is explained on page 12. Your unmarried dependent child is covered under your family contract only until he or she reaches age 19. ALL THE BENEFITS DESCRIBED IN THIS CONTRACT ARE SUBJECT TO A LIFETIME MAXIMUM OF $250,000 FOR EACH MEMBER ONCE YOU HAVE RECEIVED $250,000 IN BENEFITS, NO MORE BENEFITS ARE AVAILABLE. Other limits or restrictions on benefits may be found on page 10. In the next part of this certificate, you will find a Benefit Table. Thistable briefly summarizes certain important benefits available to a person covered by this contract. The table refers you to specific parts of your contract. If you need information about health care expenses not listed in the Benefit Table, see the index at the end of this certificate. It lists, in more detail, benefits and limitations contained in this contract. If you have any questions, contact our Customer Service Office. These Offices are listed at the end of this certificate age 2
